<h3 id="X38071">X(38071) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(4), X(5)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^4+7*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-11*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38071) = 11*X(2)-5*X(3) = 7*X(2)+5*X(4) = 2*X(2)-5*X(5) = 13*X(2)-10*X(140) = 17*X(2)-5*X(376) = X(2)+5*X(381) = 5*X(2)+X(382) = X(2)+2*X(546) = 7*X(2)-10*X(547) = 8*X(2)-5*X(549) = 4*X(2)-X(550) = 9*X(2)-5*X(3524) = 19*X(2)-7*X(3528) = 13*X(2)-X(3529) = 7*X(2)-4*X(3530) = 19*X(2)+5*X(3543) = 5*X(2)-17*X(3544) = X(2)-5*X(3545) = 16*X(2)+5*X(3627) = 17*X(2)-20*X(3628) = 13*X(2)+5*X(3830) = 3*X(2)+5*X(3839) = 4*X(2)+5*X(3845) = X(2)+20*X(3850) = X(2)-7*X(3851) = X(2)+11*X(3855) = 7*X(2)+20*X(3860) = 19*X(2)+20*X(3861) = 7*X(2)-5*X(5054) = 3*X(2)-5*X(5055) = X(2)-10*X(5066) = 7*X(2)-13*X(5079) = 14*X(2)-5*X(8703) = 11*X(2)-20*X(10109) = 13*X(2)-5*X(10304) = 6*X(2)-5*X(11539) = X(2)-4*X(11737) = 19*X(2)-10*X(12100) = 17*X(2)+10*X(12101) = 10*X(2)-7*X(14869) = 3*X(2)-10*X(14892) = 11*X(2)+10*X(14893) = 7*X(2)-X(15681) = 2*X(2)+X(15687) = 19*X(2)-5*X(15689) = 4*X(2)-5*X(15699) = 13*X(2)-7*X(15700) = 5*X(2)-3*X(15707) = 19*X(2)-15*X(15709) = 7*X(2)-3*X(15710) = 17*X(2)-11*X(15720) = 2*X(2)+5*X(23046) = 5*X(2)-2*X(34200) = 5*X(2)-8*X(35018)</b>
<p>
This triangle has collinear vertices.</p>
<p>X(38071) lies on these lines: {2,3}, {52,11017}, {355,30308}, {515,38022}, {516,38082}, {517,38076}, {519,38034}, {524,38136}, {527,38137}, {528,38141}, {529,38142}, {538,20112}, {754,16509}, {946,34641}, {952,38021}, {971,38080}, {1353,5476}, {1483,19925}, {1503,38079}, {1699,38112}, {2829,38084}, {3058,10592}, {3244,9955}, {3564,38072}, {3584,10386}, {3626,22791}, {3629,19130}, {3631,11178}, {3632,3656}, {3636,18480}, {3653,7988}, {3654,7989}, {3655,18492}, {3817,10283}, {3818,6329}, {3828,22793}, {5318,16963}, {5321,16962}, {5434,10593}, {5461,22505}, {5475,14075}, {5480,25561}, {5655,11801}, {5663,14845}, {5690,12571}, {5762,38075}, {5842,38085}, {5843,38073}, {5844,9779}, {6055,15092}, {6435,6565}, {6436,6564}, {6498,31412}, {7745,18362}, {7753,34571}, {7776,32868}, {8584,18553}, {9220,14836}, {9781,31834}, {10095,14831}, {10170,13570}, {10175,28198}, {10896,15170}, {11381,32205}, {11459,13451}, {11591,21969}, {11645,38110}, {11648,31406}, {11693,34153}, {12162,18874}, {13363,16194}, {13364,15030}, {13630,27355}, {14449,15056}, {15038,15052}, {15048,18424}, {15058,16881}, {15619,34598}, {15808,34648}, {16267,16809}, {16268,16808}, {18358,20423}, {18493,20057}, {19116,35822}, {19117,35823}, {19875,28174}, {19883,28160}, {22515,35022}, {22796,35019}, {22797,35020}, {22938,35023}, {28146,38068}, {28194,38042}, {28208,38028}, {28212,38066}</p>
<p>
X(38071) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 14269}, {4, 5054}, {5, 23046}, {381, 3545}, {3543, 15689}, {3830, 10304}, {3839, 5055}, {3845, 15699}, {15687, 17504}, {18403, 37907}<br>
X(38071) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 3545), (549, 15699), (550, 17504), (3545, 5066), (3845, 23046), (5054, 547), (5055, 14892), (8703, 5054), (10304, 140), (11539, 5055), (14269, 546), (15686, 10304), (15687, 14269), (15689, 12100), (15699, 5), (15704, 15689), (17504, 2), (23046, 381), (34153, 11693)<br>
X(38071) = complement of X(15688)<br>
X(38071) = orthocentroidal circle-inverse of-X(15681)<br>
X(38071) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 11737, 5), (4, 12811, 5), (5, 15687, 2), (140, 5072, 5), (381, 3851, 2), (381, 5066, 5), (381, 19709, 4), (546, 3530, 4), (546, 11737, 2), (547, 3530, 2), (547, 3860, 4), (3090, 15715, 2), (3529, 5071, 2), (3845, 35404, 4), (3859, 12811, 4), (5055, 15688, 2), (5079, 15681, 2), (10109, 14893, 3), (15690, 35417, 4), (34200, 35018, 2)<br>
